title: (Weds Part 1) Bobby Bones Show Trivia! + Eddie the Dad: Did He Take It Too Far This Time?
itunes:title: (Weds Part 1) Bobby Bones Show Trivia! + Eddie the Dad: Did He Take It Too Far This Time?
description:
Caller Allison tries to answer as many questions correctly about the Bobby Bones Show in order to win a prize! Eddie is always trying to be inventive with new parenting techniques….but he wonders if this time he took it too far?? Eddie shares a story about him trying to teach them a lesson after they left an iPad behind at the furniture store.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
